reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and appreciate its style, with one noting its sassy flare. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others say it's very cheap. The sizing runs small according to multiple customers, and the dress is comfortable, with one mentioning it includes pockets. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting the variety of options available. The material thickness is criticized for being thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and cute!
items.body: This dress is every bit of sexy and comfortable! I wear 12/14 so I got an XL. It fits perfectly! I love the pockets and the material is not see through. Love it! Read more
items.author: LadyT78

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric, stretch but supportive
items.body: Cute, fitted and flared. A little shorter than I expected but I'm 66. Nice fabric Read more
items.author: Kathy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, but size down
items.body: I got a small. I wear a small in everything. Like literally. Sometimes even an extra small - which would be the case with this one. I donâ€™t need the zipper to get in and out, I can just slip it in over my head. The fabric is stretchy, which allows this with room to spare. I could have worn an extra small, I think. That all said, itâ€™s the perfect length, which is great. The dress is lovely, not see through, with a modest neckline. The tie at the waist came partly open though, so I had to stitch it closed. It looks like the stitching tore, not that it was made that way, to be clear. Honestly, itâ€™s great. The tie is at my waistline, not immediately below my bust as some people have commented, although I do have a very small torso so perhaps thatâ€™s the reason why. Either way, it fits me super nicely and looks lovely besides. Would recommend! Read more
items.author: Rosie J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, so cute!
items.body: Really comfortable, looks great!! Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted!!

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not white, see through and pockets
items.body: Dress fits well & itâ€™s stretchy. Color is off white and a bit see through. My biggest dislike has to be the pockets. Iâ€™m not crazy about see through pockets that semi stick out of the dress. Also, the dress is a bit on the thin side so I can also see my panties lace through them. Wearing a body shaper helps. Read more
items.author: Martha I. Carriedo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress But the 05-Sakura was a bit of a disappointment.
items.body: it is a lovely dress...great material...it have stretch that is fantastic.. i bougth the 05-plaid and the 05 brown black and the 05-sakura in mediums and it fit well. i am 5'7" 145 lbs...busts 36c, hips 38, waist 30 just to help with those intending to purchase base on their size, height and shape. the bottom half of the 05-sakura is more pink than purple; not as shown in the pic and i do not like it. hence the 3 stars. the o5- plaid fit more closer to my skin than the other 2 that give a like a more ready made finish. whereas the 05- sakura and the 05 brown black had some extra wiggle room. by the waist. the bust fits well :) Read more
items.author: Tasha Ali

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 04-beige, 04-rose Red, 04-light Purple, 04-light Yellow, 04-light Green, 03-red, 01-white, 04-brown, 05-colorful Green, 06-green, 04-coffee Brown, 04-grass Green, 06-black, 03-pine Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
